subject: working with JFCUnit !!
msgSnippet: Hi All I am working JFCUnit and problem i am facing is .. i have a JTable in JFrame and i have given JPopupUp for that JTable and i got results too.In this
messageBody:
Hi All

I am working JFCUnit and problem i am facing is ..
i have a JTable in JFrame and i have given JPopupUp for
that JTable and i got results too.In this JPopup i have
"Add" JMenuItem and i found it too.how i want to click it("Add")
to Open one Modal JDialog.I faced problem here the Popup is
obtained and i can see the JPopup closing too.

But the action given to that JMenuItem is working i.e the JDialog
is not Opening what might be wrong ??

The Test code goes like this..

JFrame paraFrame = (JFrame)helper.getWindow("Test");
assertNotNull("Could not find frame",paraFrame);

JTable responsesTable = (JTable) helper.findComponent(JTable.class,
paraFrame, 1);
assertNotNull("Could not find table", responsesTable);
clickAndWait(new
JTableMouseEventData(this,responsesTable,5,0,1,true,3000), true);

JMenuItem addMenu=(JMenuItem)helper.findComponent(new
JMenuItemFinder("Add"), paraFrame, 0);

assertNotNull("Menu Item not Foumd ",addMenu);
helper.enterClickAndLeave(new MouseEventData(this, addMenu));
awtSleep();

here the expected result is not Obtained. Why ??

Thanks in advance.

cheluvaraj
cheluvaraj@....
